translations: n.包装材料，外包装；包装工作；包装，美化
v.把……打包，把……装箱（以便出售）；包装（产品或想法等）；配套销售（商品）（package 的现在分词）

phrs.translation: 包装机，包装机械；打包机；封装机
泡罩包装；硬质泡沫塑料衬垫包装

sentences.sentence: Attractive packaging can help to sell products.
sentences.translation: 精美的包装有助于产品的销售。

sentences.sentence: His company offers a flexible packaging service for the food industry.
sentences.translation: 他的公司为食品工业提供灵活的包装服务。

sentences.sentence: It is selling very well, in part because the packaging is so attractive.
sentences.translation: 它卖得非常好，部分原因在于包装很吸引人。
